quote: He never reckoned much to schooling and that. He said you could learn most what was worth knowing from keeping your eyes and ears peeled. Best way of learning, he always said, was doing.
quote_letters: HE NEVER RECKONED MUCH TO SCHOOLING AND THAT HE SAID YOU COULD LEARN MOST WHAT WAS WORTH KNOWING FROM KEEPING YOUR EYES AND EARS PEELED BEST WAY OF LEARNING HE ALWAYS SAID WAS DOING
